Your Path to Brighter Minds & Better Days

Welcome to Over the Rainbow: A Journey to Healing and Hope. Just as rainbows emerge after storms, we believe that brighter days are possible for everyone.

Join us as we explore resources, support, and guidance to help you navigate life's challenges. Together, we'll navigate the storms and celebrate the rainbows.

Need Urgent Help?

“There is hope, even when your brain tells you there isn’t.”

John Green

Mental Health Awareness Week

Mental Health Awareness Week runs from 13 to 19 May 2024. Take part in raising awareness and funding so that everyone can get the support they need!

Fundraising

Every pound helps when it comes to funding mental health treatments and research. Do your part this month, by taking part in a fundraising campaign or going freestyle and raising money your way - the world is your stage!

Research

Want to delve deeper into current mental health research, browse our library of research and programmes currently making headway in the sector.
